Can cause skipping of one or two exons; The paper also mentions another interesting nonsense variant which results in usage of an upstream cryptic splice donor site, effectively skipping over the premature stop codon. The mechanism for this is unclear: could be that NMD of the transcript allows the alternative isoform to reach detectable levels, or perhaps the variant itself affects splicing, despite not influencing either the authentic or cryptic splice site
